title: (Melodrama) Unwed Mother 1958 | Norma Moore, Robert Vaughn | Full Movie

sources.title: (Melodrama) Unwed Mother 1958 | Norma Moore, Robert Vaughn | Full Movie
sources.description:
20,000 anguished girls wrote this devastating story!
Betty, a young woman from a rural area, relocates to Los Angeles and becomes entangled with a deceitful man, leaving her abandoned and expecting a child. After visiting a drunken abortionist, she decides to give the baby up for adoption, but has a change of heart. 

Original title: Unwed Mother (1958)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/m0PC_uHRPnU

Director: Walter Doniger
Writers: Anson Bond, Alden Nash
Stars: Norma Moore, Robert Vaughn, Diana Darrin
Genre: Classsics, Drama


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:54 Drama unfolds as a new employee navigates office dynamics and social interactions in a new city.
10:45 A melodramatic tale of love, loss, and new beginnings unfolds as two individuals navigate through personal challenges and relationships.
19:19 A young woman faces financial struggles and family disapproval after loaning money to her boyfriend's family.
27:12 A dramatic tale of love, secrets, and financial struggles unfolds, leading to a desperate act of robbery.
34:25 A young woman faces probation and marriage after involvement in a crime, leading to unexpected outcomes.
43:28 A young woman faces challenges as an expectant unwed mother, navigating through societal norms and ethical dilemmas.
55:25 A young woman, Betty, faces the decision of giving up her baby for adoption amidst discussions about heredity and motherhood.
58:47 A young woman faces challenges as an unwed mother and receives support from her friends in naming her baby.
1:06:01 A young woman struggles with the decision of giving up her baby for adoption or keeping him, while facing societal judgment and pressure.
